content: 2 tail through the knot as shown or you can leave the i-cord sticking straight up if you prefer a bit of whimsy tack down well wet block being careful not to over-stretch the ribbing the hat will look skinny and long but is quite stretchy and will fit baby well et voilà © 2009 pamela w allen designs designs i am happy to share this pattern with knitters it may be used for non-commercial personal or knitting guild use it is not to be used in any publication nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without written permission
